biocontainers.name: pandaseq
biocontainers.summary: PANDASEQ is a program to align Illumina reads, optionally with PCR primers embedded in the sequence, and reconstruct an overlapping sequence.

biotools.summary: Paired-end Assembler for DNA sequences (PANDAseq) is a program to align Illumina reads, optionally with PCR primers embedded in the sequence, and reconstruct an overlapping sequence.

bioschemas.name: PANDAseq
bioschemas.summary: Paired-end Assembler for DNA sequences (PANDAseq) is a program to align Illumina reads, optionally with PCR primers embedded in the sequence, and reconstruct an overlapping sequence.
